title: Average E field from potential graph

content.question: The graph shows the electric potential along the <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>axis in a region of space. What is the magnitude of the average electric field between <math alttext="x equals 2 meters " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>m</mi></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals 4 meters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="10 volts per meter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>10</mtext><mrow><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>V</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="30 volts per meter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>30</mtext><mrow><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>V</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="50 volts per meter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>50</mtext><mrow><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>V</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="70 volts per meter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>70</mtext><mrow><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>V</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="30 volts per meter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>30</mtext><mrow><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>V</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
